projects.title: CSWA â€“ SolidWorks Associate Certification
projects.subtitle: Parametric 3D Modelling and Engineering Design Proficiency

description.content: As part of the CSWA certification, I created detailed 3D part and assembly models from engineering drawings using SolidWorks. Each part was designed with careful attention to constraints, sketch relations, and proper modeling hierarchy to ensure accurate geometry and maintain design intent.

The models also included real-world property calculations such as mass, center of gravity, and principal moments of inertia using the Mass Properties tool. I completed all tasks within a timed environment, simulating industry-standard workflows involving precision, efficiency, and documentation practices.

description.caption: SolidWorks 3D part with mass property evaluation
High-fidelity wheel with hub-spoke structure and property analysis
Mid-complexity component showing real-world mass and volume
Multi-part assembly showcasing mates, color coding, and analysis
Fully constrained mechanism with mass and inertia computations
